message: Take it or leave it, Bob.  I'm feeling generous.
Let's split it 50/50, a fair deal!
I'm still feeling generous, but I think my previous offer was a bit too generous. How about this?
I'm willing to give you a better deal, but I'm not going to give away the farm. Take it or leave it!
I'm starting to get a little desperate, Bob.  Let's find a middle ground.
I'm not going to give in yet, but I'm willing to compromise. Meet me halfway!
This is my final offer, Bob. We're running out of time.
I'm not going to give in now, I'm going to try to squeeze out a better deal. This is my final offer!
We're both getting nothing if we keep this up. Let's just split it down the middle.
